"(Translated by Google) I stayed in a clean room that was not self-catering but it was a clean and luxurious room that was closer to a hotel than a resort.  …Read more(Translated by Google) I stayed in a clean room that was not self-catering but it was a clean and luxurious room that was closer to a hotel than a resort.It looks old so I could only see the sea and the room condition was not good but it was nice that it wasn't long after the remodeling. "(Translated by Google) The view from the room is very good. Especially it is not easy to give up the view of the sea in the morning.  …Read more(Translated by Google) The view from the room is very good. Especially it is not easy to give up the view of the sea in the morning.However the configuration in the room is very unfortunate.Even though it is a member price how much does it make sense considering that it is the peak season when it is over 200000 won?There are no slippers in the room and towels are all four of the most basic new towels. There is no shower mattress. The fact that the drink is also 2 bottles of mineral water and 2 coffee mixes makes me feel disappointed. I knew it was aiming for a hotel-like resort but the furnishings and amenities in the room are very disappointing. I don't want to go again.The bed was good and the bedding was comfortable.Still the breakfast buffet seemed to be relatively good. It's a little less than 30000 won and is about 40-50% more expensive than other resorts but the food wasn't bad though. It was okay if you didn't compare the price with other resorts. What was impressive was the disinfection of the table at every meal. I was impressed at the time the corona spreads. The staff at the buffet restaurant were very friendly.There was a water parkLooking down from the restaurant there were some staff and lifeguards preparing to open in the water park some of them wearing no masks at all and some of them wearing only their chins. Some of the staff were using it completely.The time I visited was when water parks began to close in some areas due to the spread of Corona across the country but this part was uncomfortable. Of course I did not enter the water park.In the case of the lobby and the prot desk there was a heating checker (camera) and staff but in reality the body temperature was not measured separately (possibly automatically measured) and there are also many people in the lobby and quite a lot of people. I was a little anxious because I wasn't wearing this mask. At the other resort that I was tied to the night before it was so contrasting with the experience of taking the body temperature in the lobby and in all traffic lines (however in the breakfast buffet the body temperature was measured and recorded before entering the room). Asked but the staff told the guests to wear a mask but said that the customers do not wear it. (Except for the breakfast room ㅇ.ㄹ) I never heard any announcements or broadcasts about wearing a mask during my stay in 1 night 2 days.Looking back this place feels inconsistent. Nice view very friendly staff in some disappointing in-room amenities.....It is good to go once.(Original)객실에서 내다보는 풍경은 매우 좋습니다. 특히 아침에 보는 바다의 모습은 포기하기 쉽지 않습니다.그러나 객실내 구성은 매우 아쉽습니다.회원가임에도 20만원이 넘게 비싼것은 성수기임을 고려하면 어느정도 이해가되나객실내 슬리퍼도 없고  타올은 가장 기본적인 새면용 타올 4개가 전부이다. 샤워매트리스도 없다.   음료역시 생수 2병과 커피믹스 2개가 전부인것은 참 실망스러움을 느끼게 한다. 호텔같은 리조트를 지향한다는 것으로 알고 있었는데 객실내 비품이나 어메니티는 정말 많이 실망스럽다. 다시 가고 싶지 않을정도로.침대는 그런대로 잘만했고 침구는 그런대로 쾌적한편이었다.그래도 조식부페는 비교적 괜찮았던것같다. 3만원이 약간 못되는 가격으로  다른 리조트보다 약40-50%정도 비싼편이지만 그래도 음식은 나쁘지는 않았다. 타 리조트와 가격을 비교하지 않으면 괜찮은  편이었다. 인상작인 것은 매 식사마다 테이블을 소독하는 점이었다. 코로나가 확산하는 시점에 인상깊었다. 부페 식당의 직원들은 매우 친절했다.워터파크가 있었는데식당에서 내려다 보니 워터파크에서 개장을 준비중인 직원과 lifeguard가 일부는  마스크를 전혀쓰지 않았고 일부는 턱에만 걸친 경우도 있었다. 일부직원은 온전하게 쓰고 있었다.방문한 시점이 코로나의 전국확산으로 일부지역에서 워터파크가 폐장되기 시작하던 때였는데 이 부분은 마음에 편안하지 않았다. 물론 워터파크에는 들어가지 않았다.로비 및 프로트데스크의 경우는 발열체크 기계(카메라)와 직원이 있기는 했으나 실제로는 별도로 먼추어서 체온은 재지는 않았고(자동으로 측정했을 가능성은 있음) 로비에도 많은 사람들이 옹기종기 모여 있기도 하고 상당히 많은 사람들이 마스크를 쓰지 않고 있어서 좀 불안했다. 전날밤 묶었던 다른 리조트에서는 로비 및 모든 동선에서 체온을 쟀던 경험과 너무 대조되어 불안했다.(다만 조식 부페에서는 입당전에 체온을 일일이  측정하고 기록했다) 체크인시 프로트 직원에게 마스클 쓰지 않아도 되는 것이냐고 물었으나 직원은 손님들에게 마스크 착용을 안내하기는 하지망 손님들이 착용하지 않는다고 했다. (조식식당ㅇ.ㄹ 제외하고는) 투숙한 1박2일동안 마스크 착용에 대한 안내나 방송을 들은 적이 전혀없다.돌이켜보면 이곳은 여러가지 상반되는 느낌이 든다. 좋은 경관 일부에서는 아주 친절한 직원 실망스러운 객실내 비품.....한번은 가보기에 좋은것이다."
